Talented.TalentDef.label: Unholy Fortitude
Talented.TalentDef.description: Dark energies course through your body, increasing health and granting life leech on attacks.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Anti-Magic Shell
Talented.TalentDef.description: Surround yourself with a protective shell that absorbs magical damage and converts it to healing.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Death's Embrace
Talented.TalentDef.description: Your connection to death grows stronger, increasing damage against living targets and granting increased healing from all sources.

Talented.TalentDef.label: Army of the Dead
Talented.TalentDef.description: Raise fallen enemies as temporary undead servants while enhancing your own combat abilities.
